name: Jewelry Bonney
text: [On Play] If your Leader has the {Supernovas} type, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 8 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next turn.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Supernovas} type, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 8 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next turn.
